at.pwd.boardgame.game.base

Interface Game<StateType extends State,BoardType extends Board>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MancalaGame

    public interface Game<StateType extends State,BoardType extends Board>
    An interface describing an abstract Game. Currently there only exists MancalaGame

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BoardType getBoard()
      Returns the board configuration of the current game.
      StateType getState()
      Returns the state of the current game.
      java.io.InputStream getViewXml()
      Returns the view as an FXML inputstream.
      void loadBoard(java.io.InputStream board)
      This is called at the beginning loading the board.
      int nextPlayer()
      Finishes the current players turn and starting the turn of the next player.

    • Method Detail

      • getViewXml

        java.io.InputStream getViewXml()
        Returns the view as an FXML inputstream. This generates the board for the BoardController
        Returns:
        The inputstream of the fxml file

      • loadBoard

        void loadBoard(java.io.InputStream board)
        This is called at the beginning loading the board. This should initialize the Game. After this getState() and getBoard() should return non null values. When an error happens during loading a RuntimeException may be thrown.
        Parameters:
        board - InputStream of the board XML

      • getState

        StateType getState()
        Returns the state of the current game.
        Returns:
        Some object implementing State interface

      • getBoard

        BoardType getBoard()
        Returns the board configuration of the current game.
        Returns:
        Some object implementing Board interface

      • nextPlayer

        int nextPlayer()
        Finishes the current players turn and starting the turn of the next player. Keep in mind, that the Game class does not check for valid moves. Always call methods according to the rules.
        Returns:
        The next players ID
